name: followers
description: Uses Twitch API to get the list of the 30 latest followers, and use it as an overlay for obs.

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.dev: npm run dev:frontend && npm run dev:backend
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:backend

author: Farvell
